categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Casus Belli 44 was a French roleplaying magazine published in March 1988. It contained many roleplaying articles, including two adventures for the West End Games Star Wars D6 system. The articles were called "Star Wars: Le jeu de role de la Guerre des Étoiles", written by Croc with Annabella Belli and "L'écume de l'espace", written by Jean Balczesak.
